topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54753b51636872446a530000#post_54753b51636872446a530000
Don't get me on the games; christ they need someone competent in charge of their games.

Pokemon was the thing you played for the games.
Digimon was for the show.
Yugioh was for the cards.
Beyblades was for the toys that could take out someone's eye.
Dragonballz was for yelling and play fighting.
Gundam was for your daily dose of watching giant robots fight in wars where people died and get away with kids being allowed to watch it.

Speaking of digimon they're bringing back the original digidestined for the next season of digimon.  If I'm not mistaken it's going to be after Adventure 2, but still in high school.

topics.body: I know I keep talking about digimon, but the funny thing is that the digimon weren't invulnerable during the transformations; enemy digimon have actually on several occasions pulled the dick move of attacking while the hero's digimon were digivolving.  It's a dick move, but it's kind of funny when it happens.
